articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The cost of all-inclusive family package holidays to many popular destinations has risen this year.
articles.title: Package holidays to Spain, Cyprus and Turkey soar in price

articles.description: A piece of the Sycamore Gap tree trunk is unveiled at its new home near Hadrian's Wall.
articles.title: Sycamore Gap tree trunk installed at The Sill

articles.description: Thursday's front pages focus on Red Bull's removal of Christian Horner and fresh analysis of benefits payments
articles.title: Newspaper headlines: F1's Horner 'shunted out' and 'work doesn't pay'

articles.description: Leader Kemi Badenoch will set out her plans to restrict welfare payments in a speech on Thursday.
articles.title: Ban some foreigners from sickness benefits, Badenoch urges

articles.description: Nigel Farage's party has seen four recent defections from the Tories, with Labour reshaping its approach in response
articles.title: Reform's momentum is making the political weather

articles.description: At least three of the 25 people on board the Eternity C were killed after it was attacked by the Iran-backed group.
articles.title: Yemen Houthis sink second Red Sea cargo ship in a week

articles.description: Trump accused Brazil of "attacks" on US tech companies and conducting a "witch hunt" against its former president Jair Bolsonaro.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: At least 10 people are injured and fires are burning across Ukraine's capital, local officials say.
articles.title: Kyiv hit by new massive Russian drone attack, Ukraine officials say

articles.description: Four people tell the BBC about abuse being ignored at the crisis-hit Church and call for inquiry.
articles.title: Police investigate sex abuse claims against men linked to Church

articles.description: As the UK and France agree to find "new solutions" to the small boat crossings, BBC Verify looks at why asylum seekers want to come to the UK.
articles.title: Asylum seekers: Why do they come to the UK?
